title: thepriceinsats
author: thepriceinsats
content: Anyone got good liquidity for the following two pairs:NGN / BTC NGN / USDTOr a contact that might be useful.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: On Binance, you can trade USDT with Naira, but I do not see it paired with BTC. You can trade BTC with USDT and you can trade USDT with Naira, so I think that is solved.You can also use Kuda.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Pls contact @CryptopreneurBrainboss, or make a request in his thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5200468.0

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: thepriceinsats on October 24, 2022, 09:40:57 AMOr a contact that might be useful. You seem to be one of the few Nigerians lost in transit here, so to say? In addition to visiting BrainbossXchange Service {BTC/NGN Altcoins/BTC/Stablecoins} <Rate changed> as @rat03gopoh has directed you, kindly visit the local hangout for Nigeria (Naija). I'm sure you will enjoy hanging out with the rest of the clan.

comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: I actually know few exchanges that you could trade your coins to local flat. Exchanges like Luno, Paxful and Roqqu are popular here in Nigeria. Personally I have only used Roqqu in the past for my transaction, so you could actually look into them. To be on a more safer side, you should do business with Mr @cryptopreneurBrainboss; he is a reputable member here and very trusted too

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: You're posted on wrong board, move this thread to Currency exchange to get an user who interested to trade their BTC/USDT to Naira.Above user who recommend @CryptopreneurBrainboss is a good option too, he's a very known and trustworthy Nigerian user in this forum, he wouldn't steal your money.Quote from: Zaguru12 on October 24, 2022, 06:56:04 PMI actually know few exchanges that you could trade your coins to local flat. Exchanges like Luno, Paxful and Roqqu are popular here in Nigeria. AFAIK Nigeria bank is banning Bitcoin transaction, I don't think it's good to use that's exchanges in current situation.

comments.author: thepriceinsats
comments.body: Thank you everyone for the suggestions.
